casebody.data:
NEIL BERK and LEON RUDD, doing business as NEIL BERK ASSOCIATES, v. SAMUEL RITTER and A. J PLOTKIN, individually, jointly, and as Trustees of the S. and J. Realty Corporation, a Florida corporation, dissolved January 4, 1945. 34 So. (2nd) 459 March 5, 1948

January Term, 1948

En Banc

Affirmed.
